metadata.name: Beloved Divine
metadata.description:
With a million obstacles and a thousand troubles,
Loads of negativities and a hundred rubbles.
All seem to melt away, with showers of his blessing,
Ruling the very fabric of life, Irresistible to adore
He's our beloved divine
With a sense of purpose weaved in his eternal shine!
He's Dispelling the darkness, Helping us progress in our lives.

Tools used - Procreate
Canvas: 4000*4000

** Non-Animated High-resolution version is available for collectors; contact the artist via DM.
** Music/Vocals by Samarth Saxena, recorded in studios with pro musicians, exclusive to the Rebel Club's Diwali Collab, with 15+ artists.
Licences
